description: portrait of a figure wearing a gold and yellow hat with a long white feather; black bobbed hair; round bright green eyes; red coat with light blue trim and buttons; orange skin on face and hands, with all fingers--including thumbs--nearly the same length; primitive style; thick pigments; hand-painted red frame
image_copyright: © Estate Eddy Mumma%2C courtesy Josh Feldstein
medium: Acrylic on tan paper mounted on Masonite
signed: at left edge below center, in black: E / dd / y
title: Untitled
